subject: Child Abuse and Neglect
Sex Crimes
Psychology and Psychologists
Colleges and Universities
Football (College)
lead_paragraph: More than a decade before the former Penn State football assistant Jerry Sandusky was charged with child sexual abuse, a psychologist warned the university police about Sandusky’s actions.
snippet: More than a decade before the former Penn State football assistant Jerry Sandusky was charged with child sexual abuse, a psychologist warned the university police about Sandusky’s actions.
